node.detail_zh: 患者與第 195 宗個案患者有關連。 3 月 21 日出現發燒及喉嚨痛症狀，目前在伊利沙伯醫院留醫。
node.detail_en: The patient is related to patient no. 195. She developed fever and cough and sore throat since Mar 21. She is staying at Queen Elizabeth Hospital for treatment.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 有確診者曾於潛伏期間到中環 Pure Fitness 健身，相關分店為：加州大廈蘭桂坊、中國工商銀行大廈及建業榮基中心分店。
groups.description_en: Various branches of the gym Pure Fitness - namely California Tower (Lan Kwai Fong), ICBC Tower (Garden Road, Central) and Kinwick Centre (SoHo) - were visited by patients during incubation period.

node.remarks_zh: 3 月 21 日開始發燒及喉嚨痛，是個案 #195 的母親
node.remarks_en: Developed fever and sore throat since Mar 21, she is the mother of case #195.
